items.sentence: Tom pilots a helicopter which patrols the city's beaches, searching the waters for sharks.
Tom carried a cup filled to the brim with coffee through the hall without spilling a drop.
I have never killed anyone, but I have read some obituary notices with great satisfaction.
It's because light travels faster than sound that we see lightning before we hear thunder.
I sent Tom an email the day before yesterday, but I haven't gotten an answer from him yet.
